name: Tree cover
Description: Determined as the percent area classified as forest mapped from Landsat satellite imagery following the National Carbon Accounting System (NCAS) classification. Extended for recent years using a machine learning algorithm by ANU Water and Landscape Dynamics.
Data creator: Department of the Environment and Energy, Australian National University
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: 1) Furby, S., 2002. Land cover change: specification for remote sensing analysis. National Carbon Accounting System, Technical Report no. 9, Australian Greenhouse Office, Canberra (http://pandora.nla.gov.au/pan/102841/20090717-1556/www.climatechange.gov.au/ncas/reports/pubs/tr09final.pdf), 2) ANU machine learning algorithm not yet documented.
Resolution: annual, 1/4000° (~25 m) binary classification and percent tree cover at 0.0025° (~250m)
Annual data: annual mapping: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/treecover/250m/ANUWALD.TreeCover.AllYears.250m.nc, ~500 MB) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/treecover/250m/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/treecover/250m/ANUWALD.TreeCover.AllYears.250m.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: High and low resolution mapping for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/treecover/catalog.xml)

name: Land cover
Description: Land cover classification from Geoscience Australia Dynamic Land Cover Data. Extended for recent years (2014 onwards) using a machine learning algorithm developed by ANU Water and Landscape Dynamics.
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: 1) Lymburner, L., Tan, P., Mueller, N., Thackway, R., Thankappan, M., Islam, A., Lewis, A., Randall, L. & Senarath, U., 2011. The National Dynamic Land Cover Dataset – Technical report. Record 2011/031. Geoscience Australia, Canberra (http://www.ga.gov.au/metadata-gateway/metadata/record/gcat_71069), 2) ANU machine learning algorithm not yet documented.
Annual data: annual mapping: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/LandCover/DLCD.AllYears.nc, ~400 MB) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/LandCover/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/LandCover/DLCD.AllYears.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Original bi-annual land cover data can be downloaded from Geoscience Australia (http://www.ga.gov.au/scientific-topics/earth-obs/landcover)

name: Inundation
Description: Percent of area (%) covered by water at least once during the year as mapped from MODIS satellite observations using the Open Water Likelihood algorithm.
Data creator: CSIRO Land and Water, Australian National University
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Guerschman J.P., Warren G., Byrne, G., Lymburner, L., Mueller, N., Van Dijk, A.I.J.M., 2011. MODIS-based standing water detection for flood and large reservoir mapping: algorithm development and applications for the Australian continent. CSIRO: Water for a Healthy Country National Research Flagship Report, Canberra (https://publications.csiro.au/rpr/pub?list=SEA&pid=csiro:EP105358)
Annual data: annual maxima: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/owl/MOD09A1.OWLau.0_005deg.AnnualMaxima.nc, ~100 MB) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/owl/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/owl/MOD09A1.OWLau.0_005deg.AnnualMaxima.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual minima, means and maxima as well as time series for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/owl/catalog.xml) . Also available resampled to 0.05° (~5 km) resolution (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/owl/catalog.xml)

name: Fire intensity
Description: Annual maximum fire intensity (°C) mapped at 2.5 km resolution as derived from the Geoscience Australia Sentinel system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Geoscience Australia, 2014. Sentinel Hotspots Product Description Document V1.2, code D2014-145826, Geocat Reference 70869 (http://sentinel.ga.gov.au/resources/img/help/Sentinel_Hotspots_Product_Desc.pdf)
Annual data: Annual maxima at 2.5 km: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/fire/Sentinel.MaxTemp.AnnualMaxima.nc, ~2MB) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/fire/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/fire/Sentinel.MaxTemp.AnnualMaxima.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Time series for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/fire/catalog.xml)

name: Fire occurrence
Description: Annual number of fires frequency mapped at 2.5 km resolution as derived from the Geoscience Australia Sentinel system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Geoscience Australia, 2014. Sentinel Hotspots Product Description Document V1.2, code D2014-145826, Geocat Reference 70869 (http://sentinel.ga.gov.au/resources/img/help/Sentinel_Hotspots_Product_Desc.pdf)
Annual data: Annual sums at 2.5 km: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/fire/Sentinel.Nhotspots.AnnualSums.nc, ~2MB) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/fire/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/fire/Sentinel.Nhotspots.AnnualSums.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Time series for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/fire/catalog.xml)

name: Vegetation leaf area
Description: Annual mean leaf area index (LAI) defined as area of leaf per area of ground (m2/m2) as derived from MODIS satellite imagery.
Data license: Free access, citation requested (https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/citing_our_data)
Reference: Yang, W., Huang, D., Tan, B., Stroeve, J.C., Shabanov, N.V., Knyazikhin, Y., Nemani, R.R., & Myneni, R.B., 2006. Analysis of leaf area index and fraction of PAR absorbed by vegetation products from the Terra MODIS sensor: 2000-2005. Geoscience and Remote Sensing, IEEE Transactions on, 44, 1829-1842 (http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpls/abs_all.jsp?arnumber=1645283)
Annual data: Annual averages: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/LAI/MOD15A2.1000m_lai.AnnualMeans.nc, ~400MB) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/LAI/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/LAI/MOD15A2.1000m_lai.AnnualMeans.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Available as annual maxima, minima and means, as well as time series for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/LAI/catalog.xml).

name: Precipitation
Description: Estimates of daily precipitation (Pg in mm) derived by merging of Bureau of Meteorology gridded daily rainfall and satellite rainfall estimates derived from the TRMM-TMPA product (before 2016) and the GPM product (after 2017)
Data creator: Bureau of Meteorology, Australian National University, CSIRO Land and Water
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Forthcoming, but based on: 1) Jones, D., Wang, W., & Fawcett, R. (2009). High-quality spatial climate data-sets for Australia. Australian Meteorological and Oceanographic Journal, 58, 233-248. (http://www.academia.edu/download/35529899/jones_hres.pdf), 2) Chappell, A., Renzullo, L. J., Raupach, T. H., & Haylock, M. (2013). Evaluating geostatistical methods of blending satellite and gauge data to estimate near real-time daily rainfall for Australia. Journal of Hydrology, 493, 105-114. (http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0022169413003181)
Annual data: Annual sums: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Pg.AnnualSums.nc) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Pg.AnnualSums.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual minima, maxima and time series for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/catalog.xml, look for .Pg. in filename)

name: Soil moisture
Description: Total soil water storage (Ssoil in mm) predicted by the OzWALD model-data fusion system, which assimilates a variety of satellite observations into a version of the AWRA-L water balance model.
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Forthcoming, but based on: Van Dijk, A.I.J.M., 2010. AWRA Technical Report 3. Landscape Model (version 0.5) Technical Description. In. Canberra: WIRADA / CSIRO Water for a Healthy Country Flagship (http://www.clw.csiro.au/publications/waterforahealthycountry/2010/wfhc-aus-water-resources-assessment-system.pdf)
Annual data: Annual sums: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Ssoil.AnnualMeans.nc) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Ssoil.AnnualMeans.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual minima, maxima and time series for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/catalog.xml, look for .Ssoil. in filename)

name: Runoff
Description: Spatial runoff generation (Qtot in mm) predicted by the OzWALD model-data fusion system, which assimilates a variety of satellite observations into a version of the AWRA-L water balance model.
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Forthcoming, but based on:Van Dijk, A.I.J.M., 2010. AWRA Technical Report 3. Landscape Model (version 0.5) Technical Description. In. Canberra: WIRADA / CSIRO Water for a Healthy Country Flagship (http://www.clw.csiro.au/publications/waterforahealthycountry/2010/wfhc-aus-water-resources-assessment-system.pdf)
Annual data: Annual sums: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Qtot.AnnualSums.nc) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Qtot.AnnualSums.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual minima, maxima and time series (in mm/d) for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/catalog.xml), look for .Qtot. in filename)

name: River flow
Description: Routed river flow (Qriv in ML) predicted by the OzWALD model-data fusion system, which assimilates a variety of satellite observations into a version of the AWRA-L water balance model.
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/au/deed.en).
Reference: Forthcoming, but based on: Van Dijk, A.I.J.M., 2010. AWRA Technical Report 3. Landscape Model (version 0.5) Technical Description. In. Canberra: WIRADA / CSIRO Water for a Healthy Country Flagship (http://www.clw.csiro.au/publications/waterforahealthycountry/2010/wfhc-aus-water-resources-assessment-system.pdf)
Annual data: Annual sums: direct download (http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/fileServer/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Qriv.AnnualSums.nc) or via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?command=subset&catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/annual/catalog.xml&dataset=ub8-au/OzWALD/annual/OzWALD.annual.Qriv.AnnualSums.nc). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual minima, maxima and time series (in ML/d) for individual years via THREDDS (http://dap.nci.org.au/thredds/remoteCatalogService?catalog=http://dapds00.nci.org.au/thredds/catalog/ub8/au/OzWALD/catalog.xml), look for .Qriv. in filename)

name: Land use
Description: Broad land use category, derived from the Catchment Land Use Mapping program
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: ABARES: Catchment Scale Land Use of Australia – Update September 2017, in, ABARES, Canberra, 2017. (link to reference)
Resolution: Original 50 m data was reclassified and resampled to 1/2000th (~50m) and 1/400th degree (~250 m).
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: The fraction of each broad land use category is available via THREDDS (link), look for LandUse in file name

name: Exposed soil
Description: Annual mean percentage of soil unprotected by living vegetation or litter, derived from CSIRO mapping based on NASA MODIS imagery by the OzWALD model-data fusion system.
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for BS in file name)

name: Snow cover
Description: Annual mean fraction snow cover, derived from NASA MODIS imagery by the OzWALD model-data fusion system.
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for SN in filename)

name: Water extent
Description: Annual maximum water extent, derived from NASA MODIS imagery and Geoscience Australia’s Water Observations from Space mapping by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for OW in filename)

name: Leaf area index
Description: Annual mean leaf area, derived from the NASA MODIS-based LAI product by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for LAI in filename)

name: Persistent cover
Description: Annual persistent cover fraction, derived from CSIRO mapping of MODIS satellite imagery by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for PV in filename)

name: Minimum temperature
Description: Minimum screen-level temperature, derived from ECMWF ERA5 reanalysis data downscaled by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Tmin in filename)

name: Frost days
Description: Number of days with below-zero screen-level temperature, derived from ECMWF ERA5 reanalysis data downscaled by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series of Tmin for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Tmin in filename)

name: Maximum temperature
Description: Annual maximum screen-level temperature, derived from ECMWF ERA5 reanalysis data downscaled by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Tmax in filename)

name: Hot days
Description: Number of days with high (>35 oC) screen-level temperature, derived from ECMWF ERA5 reanalysis data downscaled by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series of Tmax for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Tmax in filename

name: Fire frequency
Description: Average frequency of fire mapped at 2.5 km resolution, derived from Geoscience Australias Sentinel system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Nhotspots in filename)

name: Fire carbon emission
Description: Annual emission of carbon from wildfire, derived from ECMWFs Global Fire Assimilation System v1.2
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for BurntCarbon in filename)

name: Rainfall
Description: Total annual precipitation, derived from BoM station data and GPM satellite data by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Pg in filename)

name: River inflow
Description: Total surface and subsurface runoff into the river, estimated by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Qtot in filename)

name: Soil water availability
Description: Average amount of water stored in the soil profile during the year, estimated by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for Ssoil in filename)

name: Vegetation carbon uptake
Description: Gross primary production, the amount of carbon taken up by the vegetation through photosynthesis, as estimated by the OzWALD model-data fusion system
Data license: Creative Commons by Attribution (CC BY 3.0 AU – link).
Reference: Van Dijk, Albert. I.J.M., Summers, David (2016) Australia’s Environment Explorer, The Australian National University (http://www.ausenv.online) DOI: 10.4225/41/5934faf27397b
Annual data: Direct download (start) or via THREDDS (link). File contains all years in the record.
Other data forms: Annual summary metrics (minimum, maximum, mean and sum) and time series for individual years via THREDDS (link), look for GPP in filename)
